k_p <- c(2.90644328952425,3.59840877132632,2.95880148150423,3.04521103816021,1.49004074065167,2.23347304960118,3.04147920280742,3.32712780887691,3.54018299879315,
3.17838089621889)

k_t <- c(166,
163,
163,
59,
351,
150,
98,
164,
191,
164)

c_p <- c(0.250749184242367,
3.51452911491048,
2.91011073927238,
0.829675865457558,
0.114496022321909,
1.35192134938057,
1.17017440489253,
3.33819769110281,
3.14846797639413,
2.29057920922733)


c_t <- c(14,
11,
10,
14,
24,
14,
6,
10,
11,
10)

a_p <- c(0.643460092785036,
0.851023811857846,
0.583041783981906,
0.392882041773263,
0.196714796529113,
0.967172858421976,
1.08471397250496,
1.40062001029038,
1.63891335732389,
0.725077071531298)

a_t <- c(28053,
16868,
16372,
18289,
16218,
48076,
8726,
47902,
51172,
19016)

p_p <- c(3.64417448400801,
4.19190623386356,
3.55777994710407,
9.09743501447709,
1.99511587762248,
2.66617554401662,
3.81400790171612,
3.8576138899148,
4.34520743777656,
4.49907640487193)

p_t <- c(5622,
4828,
5109,
1006,
7742,
9819,
1489,
4526,
5441,
4467)


hyp1 <- c(k_p, c_p, c_p, p_p)
hyp2 <- c(k_t, c_t, c_t, p_t)

n = rep(10, 4)
group = rep(1:4, n)
data = data.frame(hyp1 = hyp1, group = factor(group))
fit = lm(hyp1 ~ group, data)
anova(fit)


n = rep(10, 4)
group = rep(1:4, n)
data = data.frame(hyp2 = hyp2, group = factor(group))
fit = lm(hyp2 ~ group, data)
anova(fit)
